title: Load management, OBJ, Lamar Jackson, & Alabama-LSU
itunes:title: Load management, OBJ, Lamar Jackson, & Alabama-LSU
description:
Colin talks about the NBA issue with load management, why players are doing it, his thoughts on Odell Beckham Jr. trade rumors, Bill Polian being wrong about Lamar Jackson, and why Alabama-LSU isn't a real rivalry. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Greg Cosell, Peter King, and Chris Haynes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
